data.eml:eml: Three new species and new records in the wolf spider subfamily Sosippinae from Argentina (Araneae: Lycosidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Piacentini, Luis N. (2011): Three new species and new records in the wolf spider subfamily Sosippinae from Argentina (Araneae: Lycosidae). Zootaxa 3018: 27-49, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.278639
